languages.text: "Молчание станции вряд ли можно считать хорошим признаком. Быть может, станцию атаковали культисты? Или же, как в случае с нашим кораблем — нанесли удар изнутри?"
"The station's silence can hardly be considered a good sign. Perhaps it was attacked by cultists? Or, as with our ship, the strike came from within?"
languages.original_text: "Молчание станции вряд ли можно считать хорошим признаком. Быть может, станцию атаковали культисты? Или же, как в случае с нашим кораблем — нанесли удар изнутри?"

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “这座星站没有任何答复，恐怕不是什么好兆头。莫非它被邪教徒袭击了？或者就像我们的飞船一样，遭到了内部叛徒的攻击？”
languages.original_text: "The station's silence can hardly be considered a good sign. Perhaps it was attacked by cultists? Or, as with our ship, the strike came from within?"

traits.locale_text: “这座星站没有任何答复，恐怕不是什么好兆头。莫非它被邪教徒袭击了？或者就像我们的飞船一样，遭到了内部叛徒的攻击？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «El silencio de la estación no puede ser buena señal. Tal vez haya sufrido el ataque de los sectarios... o, igual que a nuestra nave, la hayan atacado desde dentro».
languages.original_text: "The station's silence can hardly be considered a good sign. Perhaps it was attacked by cultists? Or, as with our ship, the strike came from within?"

traits.locale_text: «El silencio de la estación no puede ser buena señal. Tal vez haya sufrido el ataque de los sectarios... o, igual que a nuestra nave, la hayan atacado desde dentro».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ステーションの沈黙は、いい兆候とは考えにくいだろう。魔女団に襲撃を受けたのか？それとも、我らの船のように、内部より攻撃されたのか？」
languages.original_text: "The station's silence can hardly be considered a good sign. Perhaps it was attacked by cultists? Or, as with our ship, the strike came from within?"

traits.locale_text: 「ステーションの沈黙は、いい兆候とは考えにくいだろう。魔女団に襲撃を受けたのか？それとも、我らの船のように、内部より攻撃されたのか？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Die Stille der Station kann wohl kaum als gutes Zeichen gewertet werden. Vielleicht wurde sie von Kultisten attackiert? Oder kam der Angriff wie in unserem Fall von innen?"
languages.original_text: "The station's silence can hardly be considered a good sign. Perhaps it was attacked by cultists? Or, as with our ship, the strike came from within?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Stille der Station kann wohl kaum als gutes Zeichen gewertet werden. Vielleicht wurde sie von Kultisten attackiert? Oder kam der Angriff wie in unserem Fall von innen?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Le silence de la station n'est pas bon signe. Elle a peut-être été attaquée par des fanatiques ? Ou le coup est peut-être venu de l'intérieur, comme sur notre vaisseau ? »
languages.original_text: "The station's silence can hardly be considered a good sign. Perhaps it was attacked by cultists? Or, as with our ship, the strike came from within?"

traits.locale_text: « Le silence de la station n'est pas bon signe. Elle a peut-être été attaquée par des fanatiques ? Ou le coup est peut-être venu de l'intérieur, comme sur notre vaisseau ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "İstasyondan ses çıkmıyor oluşunun iyiye işaret olduğu söylenemez. Belki de tarikatçıların saldırısına uğramıştır veya bizim gemimizde olduğu gibi içeriden bir saldırı gelmiştir?"
languages.original_text: "The station's silence can hardly be considered a good sign. Perhaps it was attacked by cultists? Or, as with our ship, the strike came from within?"
